opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Ozmint, Director, South Carolina Department of Corrections v. Nance

opinion:
543 U.S. 1043

OZMINT, DIRECTOR, SOUTH CAROLINA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS
v.
NANCE.

No. 04-273.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 10, 2005.

1

Sup. Ct. S. C. Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Florida v. Nixon, ante, p. 175. Reported below: 358 S. C. 480, 596 S. E. 2d 62.
